passenger-index.error_only_known_type: Unknown choice, please pick bike, car or settings.
passenger-request-location.provide_locat: Please share your location to find drivers around you.
passenger-request-destination.provide_de: Where are you going? Please type the exact street address (so GPS can understand it) or describe the place.
order-submitted.order_submitted: â³ Looking for drivers... If you found a ride, click on the button below ğŸ‘‡
order-cancelled.order_cancelled: ğŸ‘Œ Thank you, finished looking for drivers.
driver-select-vehicle-type.select: Select the type of vehicle you're going to use for the taxi.
driver-select-vehicle-type.error_only_kn: Unknown choice, please pick car or scooter / motorbike.
driver-explain-checkins.text: Almost done. A few things to note: Telegram has no live GPS location support, so every time you change location you need to check-in, or you can check-in every hour if you're ready to accept new orders. This will help us to find passengers around. Click "Next".
driver-request-location.provide_location: Please share your current location, so passengers around can find you.
driver-explain-whats-next.text: We're all set! You'll be notified about passengers and orders nearby. Keep this app running and check-in every hour and at new location. Click "Next".
driver-mute.mute_ok: âš ï¸ But keep in mind that you will NOT receive notifications about passengers around until you unmute yourself.
driver-unmute.unmute_ok: You're unmuted now and will receive notifications about passengers around you. Don't forget to check-in every hour.
driver-checkin.provide_location: Please share your current location, so passengers around will be able to find you.
driver-checkin.ok: ğŸ‘Œ Thanks for checking-in! Check-in every hour or when you changed your location! Also, check location above, if it's incorrect, check-in again and then tap on paperclip-location (instead of pressing a button).
driver-order-new.distance: Distance to passenger: ~%s. Passenger location (click to zoom in):
driver-order-new.price: Passenger is ready to pay: %s (in local currency)
driver-order-new.call_to_action: Please choose an action ğŸ‘‡ or ignore this message
driver-order-new.price_not_set: Price for this order was not set by passenger. You have to give your price.
passenger-request-price.set_price: In this app the passenger sets the price ğŸ˜‰ Give us your price in your local currency. How much are you willing to pay? (or type "0" (zero) if you don't know)
passenger-request-price.should_be_numeri: Oops, price should be the numeric value (and in local currency)! For example: "50". Please try again!
passenger-request-price.on_timeout: Seems like you've been waiting for a while? Sorry about that. If you haven't found a ride, we recommend trying again later.
passenger-contact-new-number.message: ğŸ”” {{driver}} accepted your price! Distance to driver ~{{distance}}. Call driver to confirm your order:
driver-order-set-price.set_price: Set your price (in local currency). You can include details justifying your price. For example: "20, because of the bridge repair" or "15, if traffic is ok"
passenger-contact-driver-price.message: ğŸ”” âš ï¸ {{driver}} offers another price: "{{price}}". Distance to driver ~{{distance}}. If you agree with the price, call driver to confirm your order:
passenger-verify-location.verify_locatio: Please look at the map above (click to zoom in), is this location correct?
passenger-verify-location.try_with_paper: Please try to send your location by clicking on paperclip, and then on location icon.
passenger-verify-cash.verify_cash: Most of our drivers don't accept credit cards. Do you have cash?
passenger-verify-cash.get_some_cash: ğŸ™ Sorry, you must have cash before you can have a ride. Please try to get some cash and try again!
driver-request-radius.request_radius: How far away from your current location do you want to travel to pick up a passenger? Select from the list ğŸ‘‡ or type the number (up to 10 km).
driver-request-radius.should_be_valid: That's not a valid choice. Please select the option ğŸ‘‡ or enter number from 1 to 10.
global.default_options_message: Please choose an action from menu below ğŸ‘‡
global.default_inline_options_message: Click on the button ğŸ‘‡ or ignore this message
global.replied_to_order: âœ”ï¸ You replied to this â˜ï¸ order. Expect a call from the passenger to confirm.
global.error_try_again: Oops, don't know what that means. Please try again.
global.error_location: Oops, don't know that location. Please click on the button or use paperclip-location to send your GPS coordinates.
